metadata.title: Pakistan’s Chargé d’Affaires meets Flemish minister

content.article_body: BRUSSELS, Jan 30 (APP):Pakistan's Charge d'Affaires in Belgium Faraz Zaidi Thursday met Matthias Diependaele, Minister-President of the Government of Flanders, Flemish Minister for Economy, Innovation and Industry, Foreign Affairs, Digitalisation and Facility Management and discussed matters of mutual interest.
